data.message: Eminem needs to go back to his old flow plus the old slim shady voice, his new style,flow,voice dont suit him, it sounds like hes trying too hard, what happend to the real rap what i grew up with, his new song phenomenal is crap, alot worse that his other resent tracks

replies.message: He physically can't get that old voice and flow back. His voice got to deep. The closest he can get to that old voice is the relapse voice, and nobody like his relapse voice so he stopped and uses his new flow.

That voice is slim shady all over on relapse, its perfect for a slim come back, he only stuffed up on relapse with the accent shit, if he just used that voice without the accent then relapse would of been much better and more people would of liked it
And he also used that voice without the accent on 2010s bad meets evil sequal album, anyways if his voice did get deep then why cant they use some voice program for higher pitch as they are rich
honestly i hate the voice he used for slim shady and opn relapse its high pitched and annoying i think eminem needs more lyricism like he had on the eminem show

Eminem show was the best like slim shady lp and mmlp, but on the em show he was using shadys voice but not as high pitched as relapse, they are pretty much the same voice, when i have listened to some of his newest tracks you can hear his old slim voice when he yells or goes high pitched, even at times it sounds like the old slim locked in his body in a cage is trying to get out, he even said he locked him up but still using some of his ego slims lyrics
I don't like MMLP or the slim shady LP....the shit he talks about is retarded even he has said so haha he talks about murdering his ex wife and raping his mother among other things haha like wtf?

He was on drugs plus drinks at the time, he also was angry at the time, his wife fucked him over, his mother abused him most of his life, thats why he said those things but like he said some songs are fiction and others are non fiction, either way he was a great story teller, writer, rapper 99 to 09, after that its gone hip hop pop when he was against pop artists, its like the real eminem has vanished or been told to tune it done with the content etc
imo the eminem show was his peak....encore was good, relapse was garbage, recovery was good,MMLP2 was ok, and shady XV was ok....

About phenomenal you said the truth 
But his flow better now ! He got rap god bro 💪
What about his Verse on best friend song ? 
He makes dope  rhymes and kills the beats as usual, doesn't he ?

His flow was good on best friend, its not that fast rap crap, he aint busta or tech, it dont suit eminem plus when he fast raps his lyrics are off beat, he needs the old nice normal flow with a little speed and be on track with the beat also stop thispop rap shit, bring the real rap back before it tottally ends also stop doing these beats with lots of crap in the back ground, its like hes using trap beats

Something like elevator from relapse or groundhog day or wicked ways also brainless, dont front was he best flow in years then he trade it in for this new style, i may be a big em fan but his songs are getting weak and hes starting to rap fast on almost every song or off beat
Ur just jealous phenomenal is so good lol
Elevator is such a cool song. I hope em will do some beats like that again
